column2: This character is a Dwarf of Khaz Modan, famed for their excellency as smiths and warriors. The Dwarfs of the mountain kingdoms are fearsome warriors in combat, bringing even the worst foes to their knees..

This character is a High Elf of Quel'thalas, famed for their excellency as Rangers and Magi. The Elves of the woodland realm live for massive periods of time, millenia even if nothing disturbs the peace of the forests of Eversong..
